name: Micromage
description:
INTRO

A game for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam 3

Newbie here. It's the 2nd time that I jam solo. In spite I hadn't touched GM since 2018 or so, it's been a wonderful experience!

CONTROLS
Arrows - movement
Space - spell (beware, mana is not infinite!)
D - activate/deactivate

GOAL
You have to get all the generators ON. They are interconnected, so switching one will affect the adjacent ones (use the bottom-right map to guide yourself). Once you get all ON, go to the top-right corner and activate the lever. Monsters will try to stop you!

KNOW ISSUES
- I don't think the lever works at all.
- Several souns missing + sound system != Nokia 3310
